feed.title: WatchState Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250506-c6dd50ea
entry.content:
• 0ff12787 Update readme. by arabcoders
  • 7ecaafa0 fix env key update. by arabcoders
  • 86c9518b Fixed Additional options in backend edit page. by arabcoders
  • 156e4aaa Removed WS_EPISODES_DISABLE_GUID in favor of WS_EPISODES_ENABLE_GUID by arabcoders
  • bd63aa1a docblock update by arabcoders

What's Changed

  • semi self-plug for YTPTube project. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/623
  • Support jellyfin & Emby boxSets by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/626
  • Minor WebUI design update to include random background by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/630
  • QoL improvements by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/633
  • Update mapper.yaml spec by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/635
  • fixed bug that prevents run_task from actually running by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/637
  • Re-worked how we generate sub-users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/639
  • Fix minor typo by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/640
  • Enhance name normalization and validation with logging by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/642
  • Introduced a new page for validating Plex Tokens by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/643
  • Fix makedate call when the added_at is null by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/645
  • Added more user friendly way to generate sub-users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/646
  • Switch to DirectMapper as default mapper for import operations by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/647
  • Improvements to logging & import content summary/genres by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/648
  • Allow users to set sub-users PIN via WebUI if needed. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/650
  • Add guides by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/651
  • Further improvements to guides by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/653
  • Add the ability to send backends requests in sequential instead of the default parallel mode by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/656
  • Fixed Additional options in backend edit page. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/657

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250307-200d6a48...master-20250506-c6dd50ea

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250510-093a8bbe
entry.content:
• 33fad105 Update Markdown link handling to redirect FAQ, README, and NEWS links to guides wrapper. by arabcoders
  • e3d8fa23 Add word-break utility class and apply it to notification content by arabcoders
  • a342c858 Enable episodes GUID parsing by default, and remove option to disable it. by arabcoders
  • b47194ba Add ValidateCommand for validating backend reference IDs by arabcoders
  • 1d8550f3 Added new getTotal& fetch as generator for PDOAdapter by arabcoders
  • 61d6584f Add removeMetadata to StateInterface. by arabcoders
  • 3bc94cff Updated docs on how to use the new RepairCommand by arabcoders
  • 69e4fe98 Add RepairCommand for database repair functionality by arabcoders
  • 689716e3 Added metadata status to item record view. by arabcoders

What's Changed

  • semi self-plug for YTPTube project. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/623
  • Support jellyfin & Emby boxSets by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/626
  • Minor WebUI design update to include random background by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/630
  • QoL improvements by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/633
  • Update mapper.yaml spec by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/635
  • fixed bug that prevents run_task from actually running by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/637
  • Re-worked how we generate sub-users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/639
  • Fix minor typo by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/640
  • Enhance name normalization and validation with logging by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/642
  • Introduced a new page for validating Plex Tokens by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/643
  • Fix makedate call when the added_at is null by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/645
  • Added more user friendly way to generate sub-users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/646
  • Switch to DirectMapper as default mapper for import operations by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/647
  • Improvements to logging & import content summary/genres by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/648
  • Allow users to set sub-users PIN via WebUI if needed. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/650
  • Add guides by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/651
  • Further improvements to guides by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/653
  • Add the ability to send backends requests in sequential instead of the default parallel mode by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/656
  • Fixed Additional options in backend edit page. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/657
  • Add ValidateCommand for validating backend reference IDs. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/658

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250307-200d6a48...master-20250510-093a8bbe

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250512-11767cd3
entry.content:
• 5ce3d9fb Disable process request debug trace by default. by arabcoders
  • 8ac5b411 Fixed logic error in determining if we should mark entity for progress update. by arabcoders
  • b4b493c1 Minor docs updates by arabcoders
  • c70442eb Refactor DirectMapper to improve progress update handling and simplify metadata checks; update README with video installation guide. by arabcoders
  • 5ee73021 Attempt to fix #660 by arabcoders
  • 309fa1dc Change GUID parsing from error level to info. by arabcoders

What's Changed

  • semi self-plug for YTPTube project. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/623
  • Support jellyfin & Emby boxSets by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/626
  • Minor WebUI design update to include random background by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/630
  • QoL improvements by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/633
  • Update mapper.yaml spec by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/635
  • fixed bug that prevents run_task from actually running by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/637
  • Re-worked how we generate sub-users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/639
  • Fix minor typo by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/640
  • Enhance name normalization and validation with logging by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/642
  • Introduced a new page for validating Plex Tokens by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/643
  • Fix makedate call when the added_at is null by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/645
  • Added more user friendly way to generate sub-users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/646
  • Switch to DirectMapper as default mapper for import operations by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/647
  • Improvements to logging & import content summary/genres by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/648
  • Allow users to set sub-users PIN via WebUI if needed. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/650
  • Add guides by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/651
  • Further improvements to guides by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/653
  • Add the ability to send backends requests in sequential instead of the default parallel mode by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/656
  • Fixed Additional options in backend edit page. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/657
  • Add ValidateCommand for validating backend reference IDs. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/658
  • Change GUID parsing from error level to info. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/659
  • Refactor DirectMapper to improve progress update handling and simplify metadata checks by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/661

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250307-200d6a48...master-20250512-11767cd3

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250512-cafacdf3
entry.content:
• 4c6d4468 Add notice about autoconfigure. by arabcoders
  • 14f82c42 Make the first time webui access more user-friendly. by arabcoders
  • da664d46 minor documentation update by Splinter7914

What's Changed

  • minor documentation update by @Splinter7914 in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/662
  • Make the first time webui access more user-friendly. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/663

New Contributors

  • @Splinter7914 made their first contribution in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/662

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250512-11767cd3...master-20250512-cafacdf3

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250513-57580fbc
entry.content:
• 1cbd558b Update the Add backend flow to be more dynamic with the yes/no for options. by arabcoders
  • f542b38c Fix triggering force import from first backend. by arabcoders
  • e902d83c Update RestoreCommand to support both async/sync requests. by arabcoders
  • d38b3c71 Refactor lambda functions for consistent spacing and improve error handling in version retrieval by arabcoders
  • b2cac318 minor updates to env page. by arabcoders
  • 908bc405 remove accesstoken from open endpoints by arabcoders

What's Changed

  • minor documentation update by @Splinter7914 in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/662
  • Make the first time webui access more user-friendly. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/663
  • Update RestoreCommand to support both async/sync requests. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/664

New Contributors

  • @Splinter7914 made their first contribution in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/662

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250512-11767cd3...master-20250513-57580fbc
